pages.text: The basic functions of the maid are very numerous, roughly as follows:$(li)By default, the maid will take the initiative to pick up the item, arrows and experience orbs around her. The main GUI has a button to switch pick up mode;$(li)By default, the maid will always follow the player.

$(li)Empty hand Shift right-clicking maid can switch sitting mode. In sitting mode, the maid does nothing, including avoiding harm.$(li) When the maid ride on other entities, empty hand Shift right click can remove it.$(li)The player can hold the potion or the golden apple to right-click the maid to use.
$(li)The experience picked up by the maid can be converted into an enchanted bottle by the player holding the glass bottle and right clicking.
